pullrequest.title: Download a model from Ignition Fuel

content.raw:
Looks good to me too, I'll just wait for the bump to ign-fuel-tools1 and a round of CI before approving. (I could do it like I did on pull request #2856, but I think @caguero or @scpeters know better which variables are involved and if anything else should change).

As for the paths, I'd suggest we revisit this as soon as the release is made and we have some time.
